TITLE: Op-ed: Just like the rest of the nation, America's small businesses are at a crossroads
SUMMARY: As the presidential election nears, small business owners are cautiously optimistic, despite cost concerns, a CNBC|SurveyMonkey study finds.

TITLE: Small business owners turn more bullish amid Fed interest rate cuts: CNBC survey
SUMMARY: The Federal Reserve's decision to cut interest rates leads to greater confidence among small business owners, many of whom say they will increase investment.

TITLE: Harris campaign launches small business battleground tour in a play for Latino, Black voters
SUMMARY: The Harris campaign will announce the new campaign tour hours before her VP pick, Gov. Tim Walz, debates Trump's running mate, Sen. JD Vance.

TITLE: Post-election Main Street bump: Confidence surges among small business owners
SUMMARY: Small business owner sentiment surges after election, with a heavy partisan component to the outlook, from taxes to trade, regulation and sales expectations.

TITLE: Treasury Department may fine small businesses $10,000 or more if they don't file this new report
SUMMARY: The Corporate Transparency Act requires many businesses to file data about their "beneficial owners" by Jan. 1. But the rule is being challenged in court.

TITLE: In Salt Lake City, women business owners are pushing boundaries and breaking barriers
SUMMARY: Fewer than 15% of businesses in Salt Lake City are owned by women, but female founders are pioneering ways forward.

TITLE: Middle school students in Utah are being taught to pitch like Shark Tank entrepreneurs
SUMMARY: Middle school students in Salt Lake City participate in a Shark Tank-inspired competition to pitch their start-up ideas to business leaders in Utah.

TITLE: Treasury delays deadline for small businesses to file new form to avoid risk of fines for noncompliance
SUMMARY: The Treasury delayed a Jan. 1 deadline to file a new "beneficial ownership information" report to Jan. 13 following a recent court order.
